entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Wet flurries over higher terrain. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 5:31 PM PDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few showers. High 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. A few showers beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 9. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:31 PM PDT Sunday 16 April 2023
